properties.displayName: _CSGP: AWS CloudTrail - Instance Role or User Created-Medium
properties.description:
Detects when an instance role or user is created.

Handling guidance: Review how the instance role or user was created. Permissions should not be granted to make this possible.
properties.query:
//Contributor: Vivian Tran
//Reference: 
//Description: This analytic rule detects when an instance role or user is created. 
//This can happen if an instance was compromised and an attacker was attempting to gain 
// persistance or login to the console
//Handling guidance: Permissions should not be granted to make this possible. Investigate for signs of compromise or vulnerabilities on the EC2 instance
// Identify what permissions are attached to the user/role created and see what actions were attempted by it. If not expected,
// work with SecOps to contain the EC2 instance

let expected_roles = dynamic(["EUW1-PRD-PZ-", "EUW2-PRD-PZ-", "USE1-PRD-PZ-", "prd-banners-"]); // 3/5/24 added by vtran.Confirmed expected behavior by Tim Terry. Roles with this prefix is used by a system that deploys apps into production
AWSCloudTrail
| join kind=inner _GetWatchlist('aws-accounts') on $left.UserIdentityAccountId == $right.accountid
| extend AccountName = name
| extend BlankField = ''
| where dynamic(['CreateUser', 'CreateRole']) has EventName
| where UserIdentityPrincipalid contains 'i-'
| extend RoleCreated = parse_json(RequestParameters).roleName
| extend UserIdentity = split(UserIdentityArn, '/')[2]
| extend parsed = parse_json(RequestParameters)
| extend CreatedRole = parsed.roleName
| where UserIdentityArn !startswith "arn:aws:sts::614253799013:assumed-role/prd-deployer-Role-" and CreatedRole has_any(expected_roles)
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    AccountName,
    UserIdentity,
    EventSource,
    EventName,
    CreatedRole,
    UserIdentityArn,
    UserIdentityAccountId,
    SessionIssuerUserName,
    SessionIssuerArn,
    SessionIssuerAccountId,
    ErrorCode,
    ErrorMessage,
    RequestParameters,
    ResponseElements,
    Resources,
    SourceIpAddress
